Developer Terms of Use
des:
With age, simple things sometimes become difficult. Like staying focussed.

When we're not asking ourselves "Why did I come in here?", we're often asking a family member to make sure we don't forget something important.

Senior Moment is a simple skill to remember just one thing for you. 

Maybe it's a household chore, a to-do item, a film or a book someone suggested, or the kick-off time of a sports game - it's entirely up to you.

Here's how it works:

When there's something you don't want to forget, tell the skill a few words to describe it:

 "Alexa, tell Senior Moment to remember, I must water the plants today."

Tip: any family member using the same Amazon account can do this for you on their own Alexa device!

The skill will save your item, and exit.

Later, when you're struggling to remember what that item was, just say:

 "Alexa, ask Senior Moment, what's that thing I wanted to remember?"

The skill will read back what you asked it to remember, then exit.

Or just launch the skill and let it guide you. 

 "Alexa, open Senior Moment"

With the skill open, you can say Recall, Remember, Delete, Help or Stop.
